welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jersey City, where the stunning waterfront views and vibrant cultural scene await you. Known for its diverse neighborhoods and iconic landmarks, we invite you to explore and experience the charm of this dynamic city.

restaurants.name: O'LaLa Empanadas
restaurants.description: O'LaLa Empanadas is a latin american restaurant located in Jersey City.
restaurants.address: 600 Communipaw Ave (Martin Luther King Blvd.), Jersey City, NJ 07304

restaurants.name: Cafe Alyce
restaurants.description: Cafe Alyce is a café located in Jersey City.
restaurants.address: 641 Montgomery St (Baldwin Ave), Jersey City, NJ 07306

restaurants.name: Harry’s Daughter
restaurants.description: Harry’s Daughter is a caribbean restaurant located in Jersey City.

restaurants.name: Taqueria Mi Mariachi
restaurants.description: Taqueria Mi Mariachi is a mexican restaurant located in Jersey City.

restaurants.name: K-Pot Hot Pot & BBQ
restaurants.description: K-Pot Hot Pot & BBQ is a korean restaurant located in Jersey City.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves as the primary hub for commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Teterboro Airport is primarily used for private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as United, Southwest, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Delta, WestJet, and Frontier.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and Spirit.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
